name: Coercion Methods
description: Psychological pressure tactics for gaining compliance in intelligence operations.

cards.title: Fear Induction and Compliance Strategies
cards.description: Using psychological pressure to control behavior.
bulletpoints: Leverage uncertainty to create psychological distress
Use selective reinforcement to condition responses
Employ time pressure to force rapid decision-making

cards.title: Manipulating Confessions and Testimony
cards.description: Techniques for extracting information through psychological leverage.
bulletpoints: Use guilt and moral framing to elicit voluntary confessions
Introduce false evidence to create internal doubt
Employ strategic pauses and silence to induce discomfort
